info.name: Scrollbar buttons at bottom (like OSX/Safari)
info.description:
Moves the scroll buttons in firefox to the bottom rather than top and bottom, just like in MAC OSX.

----------------------------------------
OTHER SCROLLBAR MODS

Extra scrollbar button at bottom - http://userstyles.org/styles/25539
Scrollbar buttons at top (Reverse OSX) - http://userstyles.org/styles/25538
Remove scrollbar buttons - http://userstyles.org/styles/25540
